name: ALL CAPS: Ep. 1
description:
ALL CAPS is an action-typing game set in the old west. Defeat the dastardly LeFont Family gang and derail their plans to drive the hijacked train into Puppy Canyon.

The game currently has one mode: Endless. Test your accuracy and endurance without getting killed.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 46: Project page. Vote here!
